Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

ğŸ¥Music by https://twitter.com/too_many_fish"},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":663007,"totalDownVotes":128559,"universeId":115797356,"name":"Counter Blox","placeId":301549746,"playerCount":5836,"imageToken":"T_301549746_2abf","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Take part in a 5v5 team based fire fight across a variety of maps spanning across the globe.

"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":272091,"totalDownVotes":143098,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":12316,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1798257,"totalDownVotes":140393,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":5443,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states

Crane Site Revamp re-added to regular map pool

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":28603491,"creatorName":"SushiWalrus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":555761,"totalDownVotes":57292,"universeId":380704901,"name":"[ReEyepatch!] Ro-Ghoul [ALPHA]","placeId":914010731,"playerCount":4915,"imageToken":"T_914010731_9b0a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you everyone for supporting me and my game (:

SHUTDOWN = UPDATE
Check out the social links down below the description! And follow the game while you're at it c:

Controls:
1-9 = Activate/Deactivate your weapon.
X = Toggle sprint.
Q = Punch/Kick, gives a single experience point.
T = Block, duration increases based on Durability.
M = Equip/Unequip Mask
Click = Attack
E = Special 1
R = Special 2
F = Special 3
C = Bonus Special
0 = Arata (CCG Team)
G = Kakuhou Special/Quinx
Double tap (W/A/S/D) to evade.

Do not trust any other 'Ro-Ghoul' copies on roblox! Those games may threaten your account! Be safe out there (:

Still in heavy development.

Please do not try to ruin the game for other players as we have our own moderation system and may temporarily ban you or in worse cases, permanently.

Accessories aside from hair gets removed."},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":517066,"totalDownVotes":42434,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":8189,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone.
